article_title: Chinese digital spying is becoming more aggressive, researchers say
article_description: FireEye  a US cybersecurity firm  says that it has seen a concerning spike in activity from what appears to be a Chinese hacking group called APT41  The attacks are being deployed against companies in the US  Canada  the UK and several other counties  which i
